div.p: I’ve got a Diploma in ICT and when I was studying ICT I failed my first year if you don’t mind me going through, I failed my first year
and then I felt really bad about it so I said to myself I didn’t want to do IT at the time I wanted to do business so then I said
no I failed I’m going to redo the course again so I went to another college and did it again and then I got double the points that I aimed for
and the teachers kind of expected me to get and then so once I’d done that I wanted something a challenge I got linked with
Youth Support Team and they saw my passion and where I wanted to go and we got a placement for Gloucestershire County Council
in Finance for work experience which took 3 months and that was voluntary work so that’s how it started I did that and then they saw something
they saw a potential in me and my manager gave me a sheet which had a seating plan where everybody sat with everybody’s desks
and there was mine and mine had XXXX on it and I wrote my name on it I’ll be in that desk... You know to me learning is very important
